name: Vanilla
description:
The **One Vanilla Cape‌** or **Vanilla cape‌** is a cape given to players who owned both Java Edition and Bedrock Edition for Windows before June 6, 2022 prior to both editions merging into one bundle.
The cape resembles a grass block on top and bedrock on the bottom, representing both editions of the game.
obtaining: Players were able to obtain the cape under the condition that both Java Edition and Bedrock Edition for Windows are owned in the same Microsoft account before June 6, 2022.
